mapper.insert: insert into tbl_leave sets(pk_leave_no, fk_member_no, leave_reason, leave_date) values (leave_seq.nextval, to_number(#{fk_member_no}), #{leave_reason}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_status = 0 where pk_member_no = #{fk_member_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_charge sets(pk_charge_no, fk_member_no, charge_price, charge_regdate, charge_commission) values (cha_no.nextval, #{fk_member_no}, #{charge_price}, sysdate, #{charge_commission})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_point = member_point + #{point_insert} where pk_member_no = #{fk_member_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_point_history sets(pk_point_history_no, fk_member_no, point_history_reason, point_history_point, point_history_point_before, point_history_point_after, point_history_regdate) values (point_history_seq.nextval, #{fk_member_no}, #{point_history_reason}, #{point_insert}, #{member_point}, #{point_insert}+#{member_point}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_score = member_score + #{charge_price} where pk_member_no = #{pk_member_no}
update tbl_member set member_role = #{role} where pk_member_no = #{pk_member_no}
mapper.select: select pk_product_no, fk_member_no, product_title, product_contents, product_price, product_status, product_regdate, product_update_date, product_sale_status , product_sale_type, pk_prod_img_no, prod_img_name, prod_img_org_name, prod_img_is_thumbnail from tbl_product p join tbl_prod_img i on p.pk_product_no = i.fk_product_no where p.fk_member_no = #{mvo} and i.prod_img_is_thumbnail = 1
select distinct m.pk_member_no, m.member_name, m.member_score, m.member_role from tbl_member m join tbl_product p on m.pk_member_no = p.fk_member_no where m.pk_member_no = #{mvo}
select pk_member_no, member_name, member_score, member_role, member_point from tbl_member where pk_member_no = to_number(#{member_no})

select t.pk_trade_no, t.fk_seller_no, t.fk_consumer_no, t.trade_confirm_date, p.product_title, p.product_price, (select min(i.prod_img_name) from tbl_prod_img i where i.fk_product_no = p.pk_product_no) as prod_img_name from tbl_trade t join tbl_product p on t.fk_product_no = p.pk_product_no where t.trade_status = 2 and t.fk_seller_no = #{pk_member_no}
and lower(product_title) like '%' || lower(#{search_sell}) || '%'
and t.trade_confirm_date >=
current_date - interval '1' year current_date - interval '7' day current_date - interval '1' month current_date - interval '3' month current_date - interval '6' month

select y.pk_trade_no, y.fk_seller_no, y.fk_consumer_no, y.trade_confirm_date, y.product_title, y.product_price, y.prod_img_name, y.seller_name, r.member_name as consumer_name from ( select v.pk_trade_no, v.fk_seller_no, v.fk_consumer_no, v.trade_confirm_date, v.product_title, v.product_price, v.prod_img_name, m.member_name as seller_name from ( select t.pk_trade_no, t.fk_seller_no, t.fk_consumer_no, t.trade_confirm_date, p.product_title, p.product_price, (select min(i.prod_img_name) from tbl_prod_img i where i.fk_product_no = p.pk_product_no) as prod_img_name from tbl_trade t join tbl_product p on t.fk_product_no = p.pk_product_no where t.pk_trade_no = #{pk_trade_no} ) v join tbl_member m on v.fk_seller_no = m.pk_member_no ) y join tbl_member r on y.fk_consumer_no = r.pk_member_no
